meanings.definition: A type of muscle located in the back.
meanings.sent1: Her lats became stronger after doing pull-ups.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often focus on developing their lats for better posture.
meanings.sent3: The lats of the bodybuilder were so big, they looked like wings!
meanings.sent4: His lats were like two sturdy pillars supporting his upper body.
meanings.sent5: The lats, when well-defined, give the back a powerful appearance.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'lat', referring to a unit of currency in Latvia.
meanings.sent1: She exchanged her euros for lats before traveling to Latvia.
meanings.sent2: The price was displayed in both euros and lats at the market.
meanings.sent3: He found a forgotten stash of lats in an old drawer and was surprised.
meanings.sent4: In Latvia, you can buy traditional souvenirs with lats.
meanings.sent5: The lats in his wallet jingled as he walked, a reminder of his trip.
